name: Pirate Attack (BearRight)
description:
Controls:

  • Movement - Arrow keys
  • Left Cannon - Z
  • Right Cannon - X
  • Kill the enemies and collect as much gold in 3 minutes as possible. One hit kills for all. 

Playing around with randomly generating terrain.  Turn this into a short (slightly buggy) game. Feel free to mess around with the concept. If you want to support me please subscribe to my Youtube where I will be posting a tutorial on how I created the random terrain.
